posting_body: ['Scout off Sunset', '1530 N Poinsettia Place, Los Angeles, CA, 90046', 'More unit details at:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 130', 'OR Text', '130', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our team.', 'Welcome to Life at Scout off Sunset', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1013 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'In Hollywood, we enjoy and celebrate life, we seize opportunity, and look to become part of its legacy.', 'We live in a diverse and extraordinary city and Scout off Sunset is no ordinary apartment community.', 'Scout sits at the center of this dynamic destination, offering you an unparalleled living', 'experience.', 'Every pet-friendly studio, one-, and two-bedroom apartment home captures the luxury you demand, surrounded by a creative and trendy neighborhood that provides residents a priceless LA amenity, walkability.', 'Features', '- Energy Star Certified', "- 9' vaulted ceiling", '- Spacious closets', '- Stainless steel appliances', '- Central air conditioning and heating', '- Pet friendly', '- Fireplace-Gas burning', '- Modern, Stylish Kitchen', '- Private patio or balcony', '- Granite/Quartz countertops', '- Spacious and bright studio, one and two-bedroom floor plans', 'Community Amenities', '- Fitness center', '- Controlled access', '- Bike Racks', '- Swimming pool and spa', '- Laundry Facility', '- Assigned parking', '- Package Lockers', '- Outdoor BBQ', '- Storage', '- Paw Spa', '- Onsite management and maintenance staff', '- EV Parking Stations', 'Driving Directions', 'Cross street Pointsettia and Sunset Blvd.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Saturday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'We are a pet-friendly community providing waste dispensers and collection points around the property.', "Fee's and Restrictions may apply.", 'Call for more details!', 'RLwzJ41U']
